# TO DO: Need CAP route for AEW to just circle in place
platform AEW_C2 AEW_BMS_BLUE
  
   route
     position 53n 14e
         altitude 30000 feet
         speed 460 knots
         heading 90 degrees
   end_route
   
   edit processor data_mgr 
      report_to platform EuroFighter1_Group1 comm L16_R via L16_T
      report_to platform EuroFighter2_Group1 comm L16_R via L16_T
      
      report_to platform EuroFighter3_Group2 comm L16_R via L16_T
      report_to platform EuroFighter3_Group2 comm L16_R via L16_T
      
      report_to platform 5thGen1_Group1 comm L16_R via L16_T
      report_to platform 5thGen2_Group1 comm L16_R via L16_T

      report_to platform global_ibcs_battalion_eoc comm L16_R via L16_T
      
   end_processor 

   execute at_time 1 sec absolute
      FollowRoute ("capRoute");
   end_execute
     
end_platform
